message.body: hay can i have ur recipe for the buffalo chicken dip?
Lol yea.. you need it now or I can give it to you whenever?
now ! im gonna maybe attempt to make it
Oh Geez lol... I want some when you make it lol... but I normally use 3 lbs of chicken for a normal batch. You can use 1.5 lbs if your doing a trial batch
okaay ! & what do i put in it

So for 3 lbs of chickenI I do: * boil chicken, drain water, then shred it up * (3/4 cup hot sauce) pour franks hot sauce in and cook it in the hot sauce for just a few minutes. * add 8 oz cream cheese until completely melted * add a little bit of ranch or blue cheese dressing (every recipe calls for bleu cheese but I hate bleu cheese so I use ranch) * stir constantly * add 1 bag shredded cheese (any kind. I used cheddar, sharp cheese, and Mexican style. All turned out good)
For 1.5 lbs of chicken, use same method of cooking just less of each: * 1\3 cup hot sauce * 4 oz cream cheese (which is half a block) * just a tiny squirt of dressing * 1/2 bag of shredded cheese
